# Cache key inputs for prebuilt dependencies
# Changing any of these should invalidate the cache
# This file is hashed as part of the cache key

## Dependency Versions (from CMakeLists.txt)
QT_VERSION=v6.6.2
CURL_VERSION=curl-8_5_0
GLOG_VERSION=v0.7.1
OPENSSL_VERSION=openssl-3.2.0
JSON_VERSION=v3.11.3

## Build Environment
DEBIAN_VERSION=bullseye
CMAKE_MIN_VERSION=3.16

## Qt Build Configuration
QT_MODULES=qtbase,qtdeclarative,qtshadertools,qtsvg,qtwayland

## Cache Schema Version (bump for incompatible changes)
CACHE_SCHEMA=1
